name: 柯明仁
objective: DOS命令，物件導向程式語言Turbo C++整合發展環境，條件與迴圈，陣列與指標，函數，結構，類別與物件，檔案，溢載及繼承關係，文字視窗的應用，繪圖的應用，資料處理的應用，資料結構的應用，數位信號處理的應用，數值分析的應用。
schedule:
Introduction
Data Storage
Data Manipulation
Operating Systems
Networking and the Internet
Algorithms
Programming Languages
Software Engineering
Data Abstractions
Database Systems
Computer Graphics
Artificial Intelligence
Theory of Computation
materials: Computer Science: An Overview by J. Glenn Brookshear
